title: My friend wants to use KR voices
body: how can she go about this? she said lexwah bugs league apparently. she doesnt want kr everything she just wants voices.

replies.body: There is a way to do so using an external program called VLOC, however I'm not sure if Riot permits the use of it. I'm not sure however why they haven't just released every voice pack and also language pack to every region. Blizzard does this with all of their games, while this is an entirely different company; it wouldn't be too hard to do I'm sure.
It doesn't look like the NA region has Korean as one of the available [**voice packs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594), so she won't be able to use those voices.
I wouldn't mess with League files in any way.
